nodes.text: Barracks D4 was a barracks which had been built by the Galactic Empire's military in Timira City on the planet Kamino. In 1 BBY, Starkiller, the clone of Sith Lord Darth Vader's late Sith apprentice, Galen Marek, escaped the city.
During the escape, Barracks D4 was mentioned by Unit 6. According to a stormtrooper, it had sustained severe structural damage after Vader forced an elevator shaft down into it.

Barracks D4 was first mentioned in the LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, which was released on October 26, 2010. During each playthrough, the quote is randomized, meaning the stormtrooper may or may not report the damage to Barracks D4.
